json-schema.valid: JSON is valid according to JSON schema.
json-schema.invalid: JSON is not valid according to JSON schema.

http.fetch-failed: Fetch of '{{url}}' failed, with error message '{{error}}'.

catalog.unexpected-error: There might be a bug in this application. Error: {{error}}.
catalog.unknown-content-type: Can't determine type from content type '{{type}}'.
catalog.as-turtle-by-extension: Validating as turtle file based on file extension.
catalog.as-jsonld-by-extension: Validating as JSON-LD file based on file extension.
catalog.can-not-determine-type: Can not determine type of data.

json-ld.can-not-parse-json: Can't parse content as JSON. Error: {{error}}.
json-ld.can-not-parse-json-ld: Can't parse content as JSON-LD. Error: {{error}}.

turtle.can-not-parse: Can't parse content as turtle. Error: {{error}}.

dataset.unknown-content-type: Can't determine type from content type '{{type}}'.

sparql.fetch-failed: Can't fetch data from endpoint. Error: {{error}}.

specification.has-no-dataset: Catalog is empty, there are no datasets in it.
specification.missing-spatial: Spatial coverage from the required vocabulary is missing.
specification.shacl-invalid: Document does not match SHACL shape.
specification.missing-periodicity: Accrual periodicity from the required vocabulary is missing.
specification.missing-theme: Theme from the required vocabulary is missing.
specification.missing-keyword: There must be at leas one keyword.
